scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npm rebuild bcrypt --build-from-source && npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js & python app.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt
